long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Actifile Web Upload Manager is an integral part of the Actifile security system. It Actifile to scan for files that users upload to various websites through the browser. This allows notifying the user about the upload of sensitive files to unauthorized recipients.
